title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5315.16 - Altering or falsifying gaming documents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5315.16 - Altering or falsifying gaming documents

State Regulations

Any person who alters or falsifies information recorded
on gaming documents, at the time of the transaction or after the fact, for the
purpose of concealment, deception or circumvention of internal control minimum
procedures, or for any other purpose, may be subject to a fine, penalty or
revocation of license by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5315.16

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
